snippet.title: FM Towns Abel Gameplay ( アベル　真・黙示録大戦 ) (FamilySoft)
snippet.description:
Here is some gameplay of this 1995 RPG exclusive for the FM Towns. 
The game is heavily inspired by the works of Go Nagai and Ken Ishikawa, in particular Shin Getter Robot (look at the monsters, they resemble A LOT the mecha beasts from Shin Getter's manga and anime). Also this game seems to share the apocalyptic feeling of the best works by Nagai (in fact the game it's called "true revelation war" ) and has an heavy cyberpunk feeling to it.
The game is set in the late 21st century, where a mysterious huge and floating fortress of demons and other beasts emerges from the subspace. 

It's the first dungeon of the game. As you can see, the game is pretty hard and unforgiving...
